solution_line_template: Five people borrowed {num_people_first_day} people * {books_per_person} books/person = <<{num_people_first_day}*{books_per_person}={books_borrowed_first_day}>>{books_borrowed_first_day} books on the first day.

After the second day, the total number of borrowed books increased to {books_borrowed_first_day} books + {books_borrowed_second_day} books = <<{books_borrowed_first_day}+{books_borrowed_second_day}={total_books_borrowed}>>{total_books_borrowed} books.

The total number of books on the shelf after the second day is {total_books_on_shelf} books - {total_books_borrowed} books = <<{total_books_on_shelf}-{total_books_borrowed}={books_remaining}>>{books_remaining} books
